paper_abstract: Divergence-free and curl-free vector wavelets have many applications for the analysis and numerical simulation of incompressible flows and certain electromagnetic phenomena. Because special domains are required in those applications, Bittner and Urban constructed interpolating divergence-free multi-wavelets based on cubic Hermite splines in 2005. In this paper, we construct interpolating curl-free multi-wavelets and give two wavelet estimates for a class of vector Besov spaces.
